messages.subject: Re: Herbal Rituals book (sage)
messages.msgSnippet: so far, i ve thrown together the dry ingredients for the steam.  as to fresh, we re going to cut some handfuls from the garden and make the vinegar (so easy
messages.messageBody:
so far, i've thrown together the dry ingredients for the steam. as to fresh,
we're going to cut some handfuls from the garden and make the vinegar (so
easy and kid friendly!). we'll also cut some extra to dry for the future.
i'm really grateful for just these few ideas for our garden sage. as sage is
so often a poultry spice, we, as veggies, hadn't used it much. that will
change from now on!

> What do you use it for?

--
Jessica Kelly
W o r d U p
